import "./searchItem.css"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; const SearchItem = ({item}) => { return (

{item.name}

{item.distance} from center Free airport taxi Luxury 5-star hotel in the center of Almaty {item.desc} Free cancellation You can cancel later, so lock in this great price today!
{item.rating &&
Excellent
}
${item.cheapestPrice} Includes taxes and fees
) } export default SearchItem;
